title: Why does firefox ask me how I want to open an ajax file when I try to log into youtube?
content:
Today I was upgraded to the latest firefox. I guess it deleted my youtube cookie because when I went to youtube I was asked to log in. When I clicked on the login button I got a dialog box asking me how I wanted to open an ajax file, presumably the script that youtube wanted firefox to run to handle the login process. What's up with that? Why didn't firefox run the script so I could log in?

Thanks for any help you can provide. Fred

title: Firefox ignores my theme and the tab area goes white when I start a new session ever since version 70.
content:
Ever since I updated to firefox 70, all of my desktop devices (windows, macos, and linux) firefox will ignore my theme and display look like the image attached. The top bar will be correct for my theme for a small moment and then it will turn white along with the firefox start search thing, the search thing will go back to dark but the top bar will stay white. This happens with any theme installed and with all themes uninstalled on every device. The only way to fix this is to go and enable some other theme and switch back to the theme I want.

I know it shows me using nightly, I installed it today to try fixing the issue but it doesnt. This happens in the standard version of firefox (72.0.1 current) and has happened on every update since v70.

title: There is a blank window when external apps open Firefox to open a link.
content:
If I do not have Firefox running and use a launcher like Alfred, Launchbar, etc. to open a link, it will open Firefox and open a window with the link. However, it will also open a blank window that it keeps in the background. If I turn on Session Restore and do the same thing, it will open the previous session and open the link from the launcher in a new tab of that session. However, it will still open the blank window in the background.

My question is how do I stop it from opening the blank window and only open the window/tab with the link from the launcher?
